mapper.insert: insert into media_board(board_no,board_title,board_content,emp_no,reg_date,board_hit,mod_date,filename) values(board_pk_seq.nextval, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{emp_no}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 0, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{filename} )
mapper.update: update media_board set board_title = #{board_title}, board_content = #{board_content}, mod_date= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), filename= #{filename} where board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.select: select a.BOARD_NO, a.EMP_NO, a.COMMEND_CONTENT, a.COMMEND_NO, a.REG_DATE from MEDIA_BOARD_COMMEND a join MEDIA_BOARD b on a.BOARD_NO = b.BOARD_NO where a.board_no = #{board_no} order by board_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into media_board_commend(commend_no, board_no, emp_no, commend_content, reg_date, mod_date) values ( COMMEND_PK_SEQ.nextval, #{board_no}, #{emp_no}, #{commend_content}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') )
